item.title: Layout for the new year
item.description: I didn’t blog much over the past year. But having some time in the February break it was time to take this blog to 2021.

item.title: Grid Layout for Site
item.description:
Recently some html and css videos caught my attention. I started reworking the layout using the new practices I learnt. Hope they will still work fine.

In particular I found the videos by Jen Simmons inspiring.

item.title: Mass editing tags
item.description:
Having read some about the blogdown package I thought I could cleanup my site some more.

I came up with some scripts to clean up tags.

item.title: Github pages
item.description:
Now this site is on github pages.
I had already repos on github for some time and trusted it - only private repos I keep on other places. But mostly I was missing some features a bplaced so now the move. Mostly I like that I can now post new content via git so I just need to transfer new posts and not the whole site. That now the site is https secured is a nice boon.

item.title: Move from uibk home pages
item.description:
So the university is shutting down the personal home pages. Well it’s no big deal, though it was helpful that there was a server that would accept ssh connections.

Now I’m experimenting with the free tier of bplaced. Which is basic but should suffice for my plain text pages.
